tatami.core.util.graph.representation

Class GraphRepresentation

  • java.lang.Object
    • tatami.core.util.logging.Unit
      • tatami.core.util.graph.representation.GraphRepresentation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LinearGraphRepresentation, MultilevelGraphRepresentation

    public abstract class GraphRepresentation
extends Unit
    Abstract class for all classes that produce a representation (graphical, textual, etc) for a Graph instance.

    It is possible that a GraphRepresentation class uses other, "sub-" GraphRepresentation instances for the representation, forming a tree that is defined by its root representation (the one called from the exterior).

    A GraphRepresentation is based on RepresentationElement instances, each instance associated with a specific GraphComponent. Representation elements should be updatable.

    Author:
    Andrei Olaru

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  GraphRepresentation.GraphConfig
      Configures the graph representation with the Graph to represent, the root of the representation hierarchy (if any), and an indication whether to process the graph immediately or not.
